資.definition: resources; capital; to provide; to supply; to support; money; expense

資中.definition: Zizhong county in Neijiang 內江|内江[Nei4 jiang1], Sichuan

資中縣.definition: Zizhong county in Neijiang 內江|内江[Nei4 jiang1], Sichuan

資助.definition: to subsidize; to provide financial aid; subsidy

資安.definition: (Tw) information security (abbr. for 資訊安全|资讯安全[zi1 xun4 an1 quan2])

資工.definition: abbr. of 資訊工程|资讯工程[zi1 xun4 gong1 cheng2]

資敵.definition: to aid the enemy (with arms, ammunition, supplies, money etc)

資料.definition: material; resources; data; information; profile (Internet); CL:份[fen4],個|个[ge4]

資料片.definition: a documentary film; (video gaming) expansion; add-on

資斧.definition: (literary) money for a journey; travel expenses

資方.definition: the owners of a private enterprise; management; capital (as opposed to labor)

資本論.definition: Das Kapital (1867) by Karl Marx 卡爾·馬克思|卡尔·马克思[Ka3 er3 · Ma3 ke4 si1]

資治通鑒.definition: A Mirror for the Wise Ruler (or Comprehensive Mirror for Aid in Government), a vast chronological general history, written by 司馬光|司马光[Si1 ma3 Guang1] Sima Guang (1019-1089) and collaborators during the Northern Song in 1084, covering the period 403 BC-959 AD, 294 scrolls

資源.definition: natural resource (such as water or minerals); resource (such as manpower or tourism)

資源縣.definition: Ziyuan county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi

資溪.definition: Zixi county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi

資溪縣.definition: Zixi county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi

資產階級革命.definition: bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)

資遣.definition: to dismiss with severance pay; to pay sb off
